title: No Limit S02 - Hardcoded Eng Subs - Sno
description:
No Limit S02 - Hardcoded Eng Subs - Sno

The tough action thriller returns for a second series as Vincent takes on more secret missions for Hydra in exchange for experimental treatment for his brain tumour.

1/8. Vincent gets a mission to infiltrate an illegal diamond trading network called Black Hand and catch the head of the organisation, Franck Koskas, who is responsible for an arson attack on Lola's school

2/8. As Vincent worms his way into the organisation headed by Koskas, Alex enters the lion's den when she investigates the real estate company she holds responsible for the fire at her daughter's school

3/8. Having successfully become a member of the network run by Koskas, Vincent is given his first tests of loyalty: an armed robbery and an execution. Lola falls for a young activist named Virgile.

4/8. Koskas makes Vincent a member of his inner circle, but Vincent must protect his new boss from his sister Juliette, who is investigating the recent bank robbery, unaware that her brother is the culprit.

5/8. Working undercover for Koskas, Vincent is tasked with stealing the prototype of a new drone from the French army. Juliette is beginning to realise that her brother could be the suspect she's after.

6/8. Having successfully stolen the drone prototype, Vincent must now find out what Koskas intends to use it for. Meanwhile, Vincent's gruelling secret battle with his brain tumour turns a corner.

7/8. Delighted with his recent news, Vincent decides to take a holiday, but he is suddenly recalled to duty and finds himself face to face with Koskas. Juliette is about to discover everything about Hydra.

8/8. Vincent tries to bring down Koskas before the police catch up with him. But Koskas is planning a sarin gas attack on a European Commission building where Alex and Lola are attending an event.
